verses.verse: Ho <S%H1945><s%> Ariel <S%H740><s%>, Ariel <S%H740><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> where David <S%H1732><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%>! add <S%H5595><s%> ye year <S%H8141><s%> to year <S%H8141><s%>; let the feasts <S%H2282><s%> come round <S%H5362><s%>:
then will I distress <S%H6693><s%> Ariel <S%H740><s%>, and there shall be mourning <S%H8386><s%> and lamentation <S%H592><s%>; and she shall be unto me as Ariel <S%H740><s%>.

And I will encamp <S%H2583><s%> against thee round about <S%H1754><s%>, and will lay siege <S%H6696><s%> against thee with posted troops <S%H4674><s%>, and I will raise <S%H6965><s%> siege works against thee <S%H4694><s%>.

And thou shalt be brought down <S%H8213><s%>, and shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> out of the ground <S%H776><s%>, and thy speech <S%H565><s%> shall be low <S%H7817><s%> out of the dust <S%H6083><s%>; and thy voice <S%H6963><s%> shall be as of one that hath a familiar spirit <S%H178><s%>, out of the ground <S%H776><s%>, and thy speech <S%H565><s%> shall whisper <S%H6850><s%> out of the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

But the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of thy foes <S%H2114><s%> shall be like small <S%H1851><s%> dust <S%H80><s%>, and the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> as chaff <S%H4671><s%> that passeth away <S%H5674><s%>: yea <S%H6621><s%>, it shall be in an instant suddenly <S%H6597><s%>.

She shall be visited <S%H6485><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> with thunder <S%H7482><s%>, and with earthquake <S%H7494><s%>, and great <S%H1419><s%> noise <S%H6963><s%>, with whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> and tempest <S%H5591><s%>, and the flame <S%H3851><s%> of a devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>.

And the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that fight <S%H6633><s%> against Ariel <S%H740><s%>, even all that fight <S%H6638><s%> against her and her stronghold <S%H4685><s%>, and that distress <S%H6693><s%> her <S%H2472><s%>, shall be as a dream, a vision <S%H2377><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%>.

And it shall be as when a hungry <S%H7457><s%> man dreameth <S%H2492><s%>, and <S%H398><s%>, behold, he eateth; but he awaketh <S%H6974><s%>, and his soul <S%H5315><s%> is empty <S%H7386><s%>: or as when <S%H834><s%> a thirsty man <S%H6771><s%> dreameth <S%H2492><s%>, and <S%H8354><s%>, behold, he drinketh; but he awaketh <S%H6974><s%>, and <S%H5889><s%>, behold, he is faint, and his soul <S%H5315><s%> hath appetite <S%H8264><s%>: so shall the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> be <S%H6633><s%>, that fight against mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

Tarry <S%H4102><s%> ye and wonder <S%H8539><s%>; take your pleasure <S%H8173><s%> and be blind <S%H8173><s%>: they are drunken <S%H7937><s%>, but not with wine <S%H3196><s%>; they stagger <S%H5128><s%>, but not with strong drink <S%H7941><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath poured out <S%H5258><s%> upon you the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of deep sleep <S%H8639><s%>, and hath closed <S%H6105><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, the prophets <S%H5030><s%>; and your heads <S%H7218><s%>, the seers <S%H2374><s%>, hath he covered <S%H3680><s%>.

And all vision <S%H2380><s%> is become unto you as the words <S%H1697><s%> of a book <S%H5612><s%> that is sealed <S%H2856><s%>, which men deliver <S%H5414><s%> to one that is learned <S%H3045><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Read <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H559><s%>, I pray thee; and he saith, I cannot <S%H3201><s%>, for it is sealed <S%H2856><s%>:

and the book <S%H5612><s%> is delivered <S%H5414><s%> to him that is not learned <S%H3045><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Read <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H559><s%>, I pray thee; and he saith, I am not learned <S%H3045><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> as this people <S%H5971><s%> draw nigh <S%H5066><s%> unto me <S%H6310><s%>, and with their mouth and with their lips <S%H8193><s%> to honor <S%H3513><s%> me <S%H7368><s%>, but have removed their heart <S%H3820><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H3374><s%>, and their fear of me is a commandment <S%H3925><s%> of men <S%H582><s%> which hath been taught them <S%H3925><s%>;

therefore <S%H3254><s%>, behold, I will proceed to do a marvellous work <S%H6381><s%> among this people <S%H5971><s%>, even a marvellous work <S%H6381><s%> and a wonder <S%H6382><s%>; and the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of their wise <S%H2450><s%> men shall perish <S%H6><s%>, and the understanding <S%H998><s%> of their prudent <S%H995><s%> men shall be hid <S%H5641><s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that hide <S%H5641><s%> deep <S%H6009><s%> their counsel <S%H6098><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and whose works <S%H4639><s%> are in the dark <S%H4285><s%>, and that say <S%H559><s%>, Who seeth <S%H7200><s%> us <S%H3045><s%>? and who knoweth us?

Ye turn things upside down <S%H2017><s%>! Shall the potter <S%H3335><s%> be esteemed <S%H2803><s%> as clay <S%H2563><s%>; that the thing made <S%H6213><s%> should say <S%H559><s%> of him that made <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, He made me not <S%H3336><s%>; or the thing formed say <S%H559><s%> of him that formed <S%H3335><s%> it <S%H995><s%>, He hath no understanding?

Is it not yet a very <S%H4213><s%> little while <S%H4592><s%>, and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall be turned <S%H7725><s%> into a fruitful field <S%H3759><s%>, and the fruitful field <S%H3759><s%> shall be esteemed <S%H2803><s%> as a forest <S%H3293><s%>?

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the deaf <S%H2795><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%>, and the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the blind <S%H5787><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> out of obscurity <S%H652><s%> and out of darkness <S%H2822><s%>.

The meek <S%H6035><s%> also shall increase <S%H3254><s%> their joy <S%H8057><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the poor <S%H34><s%> among men <S%H120><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For the terrible one <S%H6184><s%> is brought to nought <S%H656><s%>, and the scoffer <S%H3887><s%> ceaseth <S%H3615><s%>, and all they that watch <S%H8245><s%> for iniquity <S%H205><s%> are cut off <S%H3772><s%>;

that make a man <S%H120><s%> an offender <S%H2398><s%> in his cause <S%H1697><s%>, and lay a snare <S%H6983><s%> for him that reproveth <S%H3198><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and turn aside <S%H5186><s%> the just <S%H6662><s%> with a thing of nought <S%H8414><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who redeemed <S%H6299><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, concerning the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall not now be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, neither shall his face <S%H6440><s%> now wax pale <S%H2357><s%>.

But when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> his children <S%H3206><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%>, in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of him <S%H6942><s%>, they shall sanctify my name <S%H8034><s%>; yea <S%H6942><s%>, they shall sanctify the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and shall stand in awe <S%H6206><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

They also that err <S%H8582><s%> in spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall come <S%H3045><s%> to understanding <S%H998><s%>, and they that murmur <S%H7279><s%> shall receive <S%H3925><s%> instruction <S%H3948><s%>.
